name: health.rhobimd.oss/shebe
title: Shebe - BM25 Code Search
description: Fast BM25 full-text search for code repositories. Index codebases and search with 2ms latency. 14 MCP tools for code exploration, file discovery and symbol references.

tools.name: index_repository
tools.description: Index a code repository for BM25 full-text search

tools.name: search_code
tools.description: BM25 full-text search across indexed codebase

tools.name: find_references
tools.description: Find symbol references with confidence scoring

tools.name: get_session_info
tools.description: Get detailed session metadata and statistics

tools.name: upgrade_session
tools.description: Upgrade session to latest schema version

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read file contents from indexed session

tools.name: find_file
tools.description: Find files by glob or regex pattern

tools.name: preview_chunk
tools.description: Show context lines around search result
